name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 12, residents around Shi in Panyu District, Guangzhou opposed the government's construction of a thermal power plant in a densely populated residential area. It is reported that the government intends to build a thermal power plant in the Chentougang plot of Guangzhou South Station. The site is surrounded by densely populated Shibi Village, Huijiang District, and Panyu Xinghan Garden. There are several residential areas such as Zhonghai Wenjin International, Poly Notting Hill, Poly OCT Yunxi, and Vanke Pu Yueshan in Sanshan New Town, which are separated by a river. There are more than 100,000 residents around.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Three years ago, an elderly man in Chengdu choked up and said, "China and the United States are friends," and was accused by a group of patriotic maggots of being hyped by foreign forces. Three years later, Xinhua News Agency reporters took the initiative to go to the United States to urgently find young friends to talk about Sino-US relations

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Remember History"
The existing large white sculpture in Nanjing Metro

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Experience Service"
November 10, Hangzhou Full-Process People's Democracy Practice Center
Visitors can experience the Chinese democratic process through VR immersion and can also DIY their own character image.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens mocked "the whole process is virtual"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 12, the official announcement stated that Chongqing Vice Mayor Xiong Xue was expelled from the party for serious violations of discipline.
It was stated that he "did not care about or teach his spouse"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 13, domestic publishers received a public opinion notice that celebrities’ names cannot appear in teaching supplementary books

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of November 6, students from Xiamen Institute of Technology collectively shouted on the building, demanding "refund" and "drop out"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 13, a place in Heilongjiang required an inspection and rectification of propaganda slogans and signboards during the epidemic prevention and control period.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 11, citizens in Xi'an found a large number of sampling test tubes dumped on the road.
